. More of a stopping point than a destination, Jaca sees its fair share of travelers headed for the Pyrenees - summer or winter. With a constant flow of tourists passing through, the town has more than its fair share of restaurants, cafes, and hotels, and it is a comfortable place for a halt in Northern Spain. Jaca is also an important garrison town for the Spanish Army.

value: content=Lacasa Faus-Hutte is located at 1000 meters high from the heart of the west side of Pirineos Mountain. Only 12 minutes distance from the Ski stations of Astún & Candanchú. Jaca city is only 12 km far from Lacasa Faus-Hutte. There is easy access to the valleys of Ansó, Hecho, Ordesa ,El Roncal y Valle de Tena.
